getProperties

public java.util.Properties getProperties()
Description copied from class: DesignerComponent
Gets the Properties object associated with this DesignerComponent. Difference JComponent objects will have different properties associated with them, so this method should return varying properties based on what kind of JComponent is represented by the DesignerComponent.

Specified by:
getProperties in class DesignerComponent

handlePropertyChange

public void handlePropertyChange(java.lang.String propertyName,
                                 java.lang.String value)
Description copied from class: DesignerComponent
Handles the necessary steps of changing a specific property. This method is called by the propertyChange method which is called whenever a PropertyChangeEvent is fired.

Parameters:
propertyName - The property name which is contained in the PropertyChangeEvent that was fired.
value - The newValue contained within the PropertyChangEvent.
